content.raw: A tricky part will be the fact that LIDAR to camera calibration in the CR URDF model is performed using 12 joints, for which joint_states have to be continuously published. So this would either have to be done in Gazebo too for full compatibility, or (which makes more sense IMHO) the calibration on Multisense is changed so it is realized by two fixed joints with xyz and rpy set through the calibration procedure.
